item.title: One paper published in TECS becomes ESI highly cited paper
item.description: Paper published in TECS “Edge-AI-Driven Framework with Efficient Mobile Network Design for Facial Expression Recognition” becomes ESI highly cited paper. This is our forth paper for ESI highly cited paper.

item.title: CCF Nanjing Chapter Public Forum: Empowering New Productivity with Large Models
item.description: We have organized a forum about language and vision big model in Hohai University, Jiangning Campus. We have been grateful to invite Professor Guilin Qi from Southeast University and Professor Liming Wang from Nanjing University. Hope to see you in Nanjing.

item.title: Our team has attented VALSE2024 in Chongqing City
One paper published in TOIT becomes ESI highly cited paper
item.description: Paper published in TOIT “Digital Twin of Intelligent Small Surface Defect Detection with Cyber-Manufacturing Systems” becomes ESI highly cited paper. This is our third paper for ESI highly cited paper.

item.title: One paper published in TNSE becomes ESI hot paper
item.description: Paper published in TNSE “Edge Computing Driven Low-Light Image Dynamic Enhancement for Object Detection” becomes ESI hot paper. This is our first paper for ESI hot paper.

item.title: One paper published in TNSE becomes ESI highly cited paper
item.description: Paper published in TNSE “Edge Computing Driven Low-Light Image Dynamic Enhancement for Object Detection” becomes ESI highly cited paper. This is our second paper for ESI highly cited.
